definition: swift timid long-eared mammal larger than a rabbit having a divided upper lip and long hind legs, run quickly, like a hare
details:
noun
- swift timid long-eared mammal larger than a rabbit having a divided upper lip and long hind legs
- flesh of any of various rabbits or hares (wild or domesticated) eaten as food
= synonyms: rabbit
verb
- run quickly, like a hare
= example: run quickly, like a hare
